content: A celebration: @BioNTech_Group’s Ugur Sahin and Ozlem Tureci are @FT’s People of the Year 2020. #COVID19 #PfizerBioNTech
date: Quote TweetFinancial Times@FinancialTimes · Dec 16, 2020As the creators of the first Covid-19 vaccine to win approval by two of the world's most credible regulators, the FT's People of the Year award has gone to BioNTech’s Ugur Sahin and Ozlem Tureci https://on.ft.com/3gOed04
